text:

But Sofia Richie basked in the company of her good pal Vas J Morgan, as the duo endured a gruelling hike together in Los Angeles on Thursday.
The 18-year-old rising star looked absolutely sensational as she flaunted her impeccably toned abs in tiny sports bra as the TOWIE star opted for a loose tank tee.

After the beauty shared a stunning image of herself from a shoot with Flaunt magazine, he simply wrote the words: 'Ur so pretty' in the comments section.
